config.script:
# Set the selected custom property, which controls whether the floors or
	# the zones list is being displayed.
	
	self.parent.custom.selected = 0

# Set the selected custom property, which controls whether the floors or
	# the zones list is being displayed.
	
	self.parent.custom.selected = 3

# Open the mobile side menu.
	
	system.perspective.openDock('sideMenu')

# Display dock that contains the legend for the floor plan.
	
	system.perspective.openDock('floorplanInfo',params={})

onChange.script:
if origin not in ['Binding','Script']:
		# Send a message to 'searchZones' message handler containing the search term
		# entered by the user. The visbility of the zones in the zones list are
		# determined by the search term.
	
		system.perspective.sendMessage('searchZones',payload={'search':currentValue.value},scope='page')

config.script:
# Send a message to sortZones handler to change the sort type.
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('sortZones',payload={'type':self.props.value},scope='page')

# Send a message to sortZones handler to change the sort order to ascending.
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('sortZones',payload={'dir':'ascending'},scope='page')

# Send a message to sortZones handler to change the sort order to descending.
	
	system.perspective.sendMessage('sortZones',payload={'dir':'descending'},scope='page')

transforms.code:
# This applies the sorting and searching on the zones list. Looking at the
	# 'exp' property in the expression structure binding, if the sort type is
	# looking at the area/dept of the zone or the name of the zone, then we
	# only need to execute the sort once (area/dept and zone name are static).
	# If the sort type is not area/dept or zone name, then utilize the now()
	# function to re-apply the sorting every 10 seconds.
	
	search = value['search']
	
	if len(search) == 0:
		# No search, so make sure that all instances are being displayed.
	
		for instance in self.props.instances:
			if instance['instanceStyle']['display'] == 'none':
				instance['instanceStyle']['display'] = 'flex'
	else:
		# User is searching for something. Make search text lowercase,
		# iterate through zones to see which zones contain the search
		# text within their "area + vavName + requesting", and set the
		# instanceStyle.display for each zone accordingly.	
	
		search = search.lower()
		
		for instance in self.props.instances:
			whatToSearch = instance['area'] + instance['vav'] + instance['req']
			
			if search not in whatToSearch.lower():
				instance['instanceStyle']['display'] = 'none'
			else:
				instance['instanceStyle']['display'] = 'flex'
	
	# Apply the sorting using 'sorted' function.
	
	sortType = value['sortType']
	sortDir = value['sortDir']
	
	if sortDir == 'ascending':
		self.props.instances = sorted(self.props.instances, key=lambda d: d[sortType])
	else:
		self.props.instances = sorted(self.props.instances, key=lambda d: d[sortType], reverse=True)

config.script:
# Display dock that explains the temp sp delta calculation.
	
	system.perspective.openDock('desiredSPInfo',params={})
